//Gray Bin = (Bin >> 1) XOR Bin
Dec  [Bin]     [Gray Bin]   
 0   0b00_0000 0b00_0000 (0x00)
 1   0b00_0001 0b00_0001 (0x01)
 2   0b00_0010 0b00_0011 (0x03)
 3   0b00_0011 0b00_0010 (0x02)
 4   0b00_0100 0b00_0110 (0x06)
 5   0b00_0101 0b00_0111 (0x07)
 6   0b00_0110 0b00_0101 (0x05)
 7   0b00_0111 0b00_0100 (0x04)
 8   0b00_1000 0b00_1100 (0x0C)
 9   0b00_1001 0b00_1101 (0x0D)
 10  0b00_1010 0b00_1111 (0x0F)
 11  0b00_1011 0b00_1110 (0x0E)
 12  0b00_1100 0b00_1010 (0x0A)
 13  0b00_1101 0b00_1011 (0x0B)
 14  0b00_1110 0b00_1001 (0x09)
 15  0b00_1111 0b00_1000 (0x08)
 
 16  0b01_0000 0b01_1000 (0x18)
 17  0b01_0001 0b01_1001 (0x19) 
 18  0b01_0010 0b01_1011 (0x1B)
 19  0b01_0011 0b01_1010 (0x1A)
 20  0b01_0100 0b01_1110 (0x1E)
 21  0b01_0101 0b01_1111 (0x1F)
 22  0b01_0110 0b01_1101 (0x1D)
 23  0b01_0111 0b01_1100 (0x1C)
 24  0b01_1000 0b01_0100 (0x14)
 25  0b01_1001 0b01_0101 (0x15)
 26  0b01_1010 0b01_0111 (0x17)
 27  0b01_1011 0b01_0110 (0x16)
 28  0b01_1100 0b01_0010 (0x12)
 29  0b01_1101 0b01_0011 (0x13)
 30  0b01_1110 0b01_0001 (0x11)
 31  0b01_1111 0b01_0000 (0x10)
 
 32  0b10_0000 0b11_0000 (0x30)
 33  0b10_0001 0b11_0001 (0x31)
 34  0b10_0010 0b11_0011 (0x33)
 35  0b10_0011 0b11_0010 (0x32)
 36  0b10_0100 0b11_0110 (0x36)
 37  0b10_0101 0b11_0111 (0x37)
 38  0b10_0110 0b11_0101 (0x35)
 39  0b10_0111 0b11_0100 (0x34)
 40  0b10_1000 0b11_1100 (0x3C)
 41  0b10_1001 0b11_1101 (0x3D)
 42  0b10_1010 0b11_1111 (0x3F)
 43  0b10_1011 0b11_1110 (0x3E)
 44  0b10_1100 0b11_1010 (0x3A)
 45  0b10_1101 0b11_1011 (0x3B)
 46  0b10_1110 0b11_1001 (0x39)
 47  0b10_1111 0b11_1000 (0x38)
 
 48  0b11_0000 0010_1000 (0x28)
 49  0b11_0001 0010_1001 (0x29)
 50  0b11_0010 0b10_1011 (0x2B)
 51  0b11_0011 0b10_1010 (0x2A)
 52  0b11_0100 0b10_1110 (0x2E)
 53  0b11_0101 0b10_1111 (0x2F)
 54  0b11_0110 0b10_1101 (0x2D)
 55  0b11_0111 0b10_1100 (0x2C)
 56  0b11_1000 0b10_0100 (0x24)
 57  0b11_1001 0b10_0101 (0x25)
 58  0b11_1010 0b10_0111 (0x27)
 59  0b11_1011 0b10_0110 (0x26)
 60  0b11_1100 0b10_0010 (0x22)
 61  0b11_1101 0b10_0011 (0x23)
 62  0b11_1110 0b10_0001 (0x21)
 63  0b11_1111 0b10_0000 (0x20)
